samplerSceneMain.description: Would you like to opt-in to enable cloud diagnostics? Anonymous information such as error messages, system specifications, and game version will be sent to the developer to help track down bugs and provide a smoother game experience. It would be a huge help! This setting can be changed at any time in the game settings menu.

samplerSceneMain.description:
Motion Sickness Warning:
This game may induce motion sickness.  
It may take some time to get used to, but the feeling of nausea will diminish with practice. 

If at any point you feel nauseous, please remove the HMD and take a break.

Motion Sickness Warning:
This game may induce motion sickness.

vtolvrStrings.type: Name of a legacy tutorial objective

vtolvrStrings.description: Welcome to the Vertical Flight autopilot training.
vtolvrStrings.content: Welcome to the Vertical Flight autopilot training.

vtolvrStrings.description: Vertical flight can be tricky, but by using the AP, you will be a master in no time.
vtolvrStrings.content: Vertical flight can be tricky, but by using the AP, you will be a master in no time.

vtolvrStrings.description: First, make sure the engines are tilted at 90 degrees.
vtolvrStrings.content: First, make sure the engines are tilted at 90 degrees.

vtolvrStrings.description: First, make sure the engines are tilted at 90 degrees.
vtolvrStrings.content: First, make sure the engines are tilted at 90 degrees.

vtolvrStrings.description: The HVR mode will assist you in staying upright and keeping your horizontal velocity under control.
vtolvrStrings.content: The HVR mode will assist you in staying upright and keeping your horizontal velocity under control.

vtolvrStrings.description: The ALT mode will take control of the engines and convert inputs into climb or descent rates.
vtolvrStrings.content: The ALT mode will take control of the engines and convert inputs into climb or descent rates.

vtolvrStrings.description: Keeping your throttle centered will hold a hover
vtolvrStrings.content: Keeping your throttle centered will hold a hover

vtolvrStrings.description: Raise or lower the throttle to climb or descend
vtolvrStrings.content: Raise or lower the throttle to climb or descend

vtolvrStrings.description: Keep your left thumb away from the tilt control.
vtolvrStrings.content: Keep your left thumb away from the tilt control.

vtolvrStrings.description: Any engine tilt less than 90 will disengage HVR AP
vtolvrStrings.content: Any engine tilt less than 90 will disengage HVR AP

vtolvrStrings.description: Lift throttle now.  Climb to {50} altitude.
vtolvrStrings.content: Lift throttle now.  Climb to {50} altitude.

vtolvrStrings.description: Now set your throttle lever to the midpoint to hover.
vtolvrStrings.content: Now set your throttle lever to the midpoint to hover.

vtolvrStrings.description: You should now be in a stable hover
vtolvrStrings.content: You should now be in a stable hover

vtolvrStrings.description: You can make adjustments to the throttle to climb or descend as needed.
vtolvrStrings.content: You can make adjustments to the throttle to climb or descend as needed.

vtolvrStrings.description: Now you can use the joystick to move around
vtolvrStrings.content: Now you can use the joystick to move around

vtolvrStrings.description: The HVR autopilot will handle attitude control
vtolvrStrings.content: The HVR autopilot will handle attitude control

vtolvrStrings.description: You just have to tilt the joystick in the direction you want to go
vtolvrStrings.content: You just have to tilt the joystick in the direction you want to go

vtolvrStrings.description: You can also twist the joystick to yaw
vtolvrStrings.content: You can also twist the joystick to yaw

vtolvrStrings.description: As you move around, study how the AP handles the vehicle
vtolvrStrings.content: As you move around, study how the AP handles the vehicle

vtolvrStrings.description: Let's try flying into some targets.
vtolvrStrings.content: Let's try flying into some targets.

vtolvrStrings.description: Great! Now lets try to land back on the helipad.
vtolvrStrings.content: Great! Now lets try to land back on the helipad.

vtolvrStrings.description: Bring yourself to a stop by centering the throttle, and steering the stick in the opposite direction as your horizontal velocity indicator.
vtolvrStrings.content: Bring yourself to a stop by centering the throttle, and steering the stick in the opposite direction as your horizontal velocity indicator.

vtolvrStrings.description: Rotate to face towards the helipads.
vtolvrStrings.content: Rotate to face towards the helipads.

vtolvrStrings.description: Begin to move towards the pad.  Adjust your altitude control and steer so your velocity vector is pointed just above the pad.
vtolvrStrings.content: Begin to move towards the pad.  Adjust your altitude control and steer so your velocity vector is pointed just above the pad.

vtolvrStrings.description: Slow your forward speed and rate of descent.
vtolvrStrings.content: Slow your forward speed and rate of descent.

vtolvrStrings.description: Adjust rate of descent to bring it down gently.

vtolvrStrings.type: Name of a legacy tutorial objective

vtolvrStrings.description: Welcome to the basic weapons tutorial.
vtolvrStrings.content: Welcome to the basic weapons tutorial.

vtolvrStrings.description: Today, we will be covering weapon configuration, target acquisition, and firing weapons.
vtolvrStrings.content: Today, we will be covering weapon configuration, target acquisition, and firing weapons.

vtolvrStrings.description: Let's start by setting the MFDs to the pages we will use.
vtolvrStrings.content: Let's start by setting the MFDs to the pages we will use.

vtolvrStrings.description: The EQUIP page shows what you have on each of the vehicle's equipment mounts.
vtolvrStrings.content: The EQUIP page shows what you have on each of the vehicle's equipment mounts.

vtolvrStrings.description: It displays information on each item, and allows you to arm/disarm, configure, or mark them for jettison.
vtolvrStrings.content: It displays information on each item, and allows you to arm/disarm, configure, or mark them for jettison.

vtolvrStrings.description: We'll go over each feature in more detail later.
vtolvrStrings.content: We'll go over each feature in more detail later.

vtolvrStrings.description: The TGP is what you will use to acquire ground targets.
vtolvrStrings.content: The TGP is what you will use to acquire ground targets.

vtolvrStrings.description: To use it, first you must supply power to the sensor mounted under the nose of the vehicle.
vtolvrStrings.content: To use it, first you must supply power to the sensor mounted under the nose of the vehicle.

vtolvrStrings.description: The TGP will be in FWD mode by default, which just looks straight forward.
vtolvrStrings.content: The TGP will be in FWD mode by default, which just looks straight forward.

vtolvrStrings.description: To be able to control it, you must designate the TGP as the sensor of interest (SOI).
vtolvrStrings.content: To be able to control it, you must designate the TGP as the sensor of interest (SOI).

vtolvrStrings.description: Now, you can slew the targeting sensor around using the thumb control on your joystick.
vtolvrStrings.content: Now, you can slew the targeting sensor around using the thumb control on your joystick.

vtolvrStrings.description: Try slewing the TGP around using the joystick thumb control.
vtolvrStrings.content: Try slewing the TGP around using the joystick thumb control.

vtolvrStrings.description: When you move the sensor, it will auto switch to TGT mode, which locks its focus point on the ground while you're flying.
vtolvrStrings.content: When you move the sensor, it will auto switch to TGT mode, which locks its focus point on the ground while you're flying.

vtolvrStrings.description: The yellow arrow on the screen shows the relative bearing to the target point.
vtolvrStrings.content: The yellow arrow on the screen shows the relative bearing to the target point.

vtolvrStrings.description: The target point also shows up on the NAV map as a yellow cross.
vtolvrStrings.content: The target point also shows up on the NAV map as a yellow cross.

vtolvrStrings.description: Now let's find some targets.  Take off and fly to the objective waypoint.
vtolvrStrings.content: Now let's find some targets.  Take off and fly to the objective waypoint.

vtolvrStrings.description: Now that we are in the AO, you can enable the Master Arm switch.
vtolvrStrings.content: Now that we are in the AO, you can enable the Master Arm switch.

vtolvrStrings.description: With the weapon system armed, you will see some new icons on the HUD
vtolvrStrings.content: With the weapon system armed, you will see some new icons on the HUD

vtolvrStrings.description: At the center, you have the weapon targeting reticle or pipper.
vtolvrStrings.content: At the center, you have the weapon targeting reticle or pipper.

vtolvrStrings.description: Here, you have weapon type, name, and shots remaining.
vtolvrStrings.content: Here, you have weapon type, name, and shots remaining.

vtolvrStrings.description: You can cycle through all ARMED weapons by pressing the button on the joystick.
vtolvrStrings.content: You can cycle through all ARMED weapons by pressing the button on the joystick.

vtolvrStrings.description: These unguided weapons can be fired by simply pulling the trigger on the joystick.
vtolvrStrings.content: These unguided weapons can be fired by simply pulling the trigger on the joystick.

vtolvrStrings.description: You have limited stores so save your rounds for the targets.
vtolvrStrings.content: You have limited stores so save your rounds for the targets.

vtolvrStrings.description: Let's try deploying the GAU-8 on some ground targets.
vtolvrStrings.content: Let's try deploying the GAU-8 on some ground targets.

vtolvrStrings.description: In a moment, you'll receive a mission objective.
vtolvrStrings.content: In a moment, you'll receive a mission objective.

vtolvrStrings.description: You can auto-slew your TGP to the objective waypoint by pressing the WPT button in the TGP screen.
vtolvrStrings.content: You can auto-slew your TGP to the objective waypoint by pressing the WPT button in the TGP screen.

vtolvrStrings.description: Go ahead and destroy the tanks.
vtolvrStrings.content: Go ahead and destroy the tanks.

vtolvrStrings.description: Great job!  Now let's work with rockets.
vtolvrStrings.content: Great job!  Now let's work with rockets.

vtolvrStrings.description: By default, each pull of the trigger will fire one rocket.
vtolvrStrings.content: By default, each pull of the trigger will fire one rocket.

vtolvrStrings.description: However, they can be configured to launch rapidly.  This is called 'ripple' firing.
vtolvrStrings.content: However, they can be configured to launch rapidly.  This is called 'ripple' firing.

vtolvrStrings.description: To access a weapons config menu, set the EQUIP MFD page to CONFIG mode
vtolvrStrings.content: To access a weapons config menu, set the EQUIP MFD page to CONFIG mode

vtolvrStrings.description: Then, select the weapon you want to configure.
vtolvrStrings.content: Then, select the weapon you want to configure.

vtolvrStrings.description: If you have multiple of the same weapon, the settings will be copied over to all of them.
vtolvrStrings.content: If you have multiple of the same weapon, the settings will be copied over to all of them.

vtolvrStrings.description: Try setting the rockets to different ripple intervals and destroy the next set of targets.
vtolvrStrings.content: Try setting the rockets to different ripple intervals and destroy the next set of targets.

vtolvrStrings.description: Well done! You've destroyed all of the targets.
vtolvrStrings.content: Well done! You've destroyed all of the targets.

vtolvrStrings.description: This concludes the basic weapons tutorial.
vtolvrStrings.content: This concludes the basic weapons tutorial.

vtolvrStrings.type: Name of a legacy tutorial objective

vtolvrStrings.description: Welcome to the Basic Flight tutorial.
vtolvrStrings.content: Welcome to the Basic Flight tutorial.

vtolvrStrings.description: We'll skip the start-up procedure now.
vtolvrStrings.content: We'll skip the start-up procedure now.

vtolvrStrings.description: The main flight controls are the joystick and throttle.  You can grip them by holding the grip buttons, or toggle lock your hands to them by tapping the grip buttons.
vtolvrStrings.content: The main flight controls are the joystick and throttle.  You can grip them by holding the grip buttons, or toggle lock your hands to them by tapping the grip buttons.

vtolvrStrings.description: To steer the front wheel, you will have to twist the joystick on the vertical axis.
vtolvrStrings.content: To steer the front wheel, you will have to twist the joystick on the vertical axis.

vtolvrStrings.description: In order to get moving, we need to tilt the engines to the forward position.
vtolvrStrings.content: In order to get moving, we need to tilt the engines to the forward position.

vtolvrStrings.description: Hold the throttle trigger to lock the brakes
vtolvrStrings.content: Hold the throttle trigger to lock the brakes

vtolvrStrings.description: Then press and hold up on the throttle thumb control to tilt the engines forward.
vtolvrStrings.content: Then press and hold up on the throttle thumb control to tilt the engines forward.

vtolvrStrings.description: If you release the brakes and slightly lift the throttle lever, you will start to roll.
vtolvrStrings.content: If you release the brakes and slightly lift the throttle lever, you will start to roll.

vtolvrStrings.description: Apply small amounts of throttle or brakes to control your speed.
vtolvrStrings.content: Apply small amounts of throttle or brakes to control your speed.

vtolvrStrings.description: Full stop!  Throttle down and hold the throttle brake trigger.
vtolvrStrings.content: Full stop!  Throttle down and hold the throttle brake trigger.

vtolvrStrings.description: Let's prepare for a conventional take-off.
vtolvrStrings.content: Let's prepare for a conventional take-off.

vtolvrStrings.description: Set the brake lock so you can free up your hands.
vtolvrStrings.content: Set the brake lock so you can free up your hands.

vtolvrStrings.description: Make sure all flight assists are enabled
vtolvrStrings.content: Make sure all flight assists are enabled

vtolvrStrings.description: Check that the engines are tilted all the way forward.
vtolvrStrings.content: Check that the engines are tilted all the way forward.

vtolvrStrings.description: Now grab the throttle and hold the brakes...
vtolvrStrings.content: Now grab the throttle and hold the brakes...

vtolvrStrings.description: Now.. to take off, raise the throttle to full and steer to keep aligned with the runway.
vtolvrStrings.content: Now.. to take off, raise the throttle to full and steer to keep aligned with the runway.

vtolvrStrings.description: Speed up to [80]! Straight down the runway!
vtolvrStrings.content: Speed up to [80]! Straight down the runway!

vtolvrStrings.description: Now carefully rotate the joystick back to pull the nose up!
vtolvrStrings.content: Now carefully rotate the joystick back to pull the nose up!

vtolvrStrings.description: Now gently steer your nose to about 20 degrees and keep climbing to {1000} ASL.
vtolvrStrings.content: Now gently steer your nose to about 20 degrees and keep climbing to {1000} ASL.

vtolvrStrings.description: Rotate the joystick left or right to roll towards your target
vtolvrStrings.content: Rotate the joystick left or right to roll towards your target

vtolvrStrings.description: Rotate the joystick forward or back to pitch your nose towards it.
vtolvrStrings.content: Rotate the joystick forward or back to pitch your nose towards it.

vtolvrStrings.description: This is your velocity vector, showing the direction you are moving.
vtolvrStrings.content: This is your velocity vector, showing the direction you are moving.

vtolvrStrings.description: You want to steer velocity vector towards where you want to go.
vtolvrStrings.content: You want to steer velocity vector towards where you want to go.

vtolvrStrings.description: Great flying! Now let's try to land at the airbase.
vtolvrStrings.content: Great flying! Now let's try to land at the airbase.

vtolvrStrings.description: Start your landing here at about [150]
vtolvrStrings.content: Start your landing here at about [150]

vtolvrStrings.description: Line up with the runway and bring speed down to about [100]
vtolvrStrings.content: Line up with the runway and bring speed down to about [100]

vtolvrStrings.description: Flaps down, gear down.  Speed down to [80]
vtolvrStrings.content: Flaps down, gear down.  Speed down to [80]

vtolvrStrings.description: Maintain speed and glide slope.  Keep the vector on target!
vtolvrStrings.content: Maintain speed and glide slope.  Keep the vector on target!

vtolvrStrings.description: Prepare to flare nose up for a smooth landing
vtolvrStrings.content: Prepare to flare nose up for a smooth landing

vtolvrStrings.description: Touch down! Bring your nose down.
vtolvrStrings.content: Touch down! Bring your nose down.

vtolvrStrings.description: Steer down the runway, throttle down and carefully apply brakes.
vtolvrStrings.content: Steer down the runway, throttle down and carefully apply brakes.

vtolvrStrings.description: Congratulations!  This concludes the basic flight tutorial.
vtolvrStrings.content: Congratulations!  This concludes the basic flight tutorial.

vtolvrStrings.description:
Negotiations for peace have failed.  We believe the enemy will strike here first, as a stepping stone to the mainland.

We have begun preparing coastal air defenses.
vtolvrStrings.content:
Negotiations for peace have failed.  We believe the enemy will strike here first, as a stepping stone to the mainland.

We have begun preparing coastal air defenses.

vtolvrStrings.description:
As an AV-42C pilot, you will deliver personnel to the defense sites.

Other pilots and soldiers will be arriving by air from the mainland soon.
vtolvrStrings.content:
As an AV-42C pilot, you will deliver personnel to the defense sites.

Other pilots and soldiers will be arriving by air from the mainland soon.

vtolvrStrings.description: As we continue to prepare our defenses against the invasive enemy forces, we need to secure supply routes from the mainland to the island.
vtolvrStrings.content: As we continue to prepare our defenses against the invasive enemy forces, we need to secure supply routes from the mainland to the island.

vtolvrStrings.description: The troops you recovered from the crash site reported that they spotted what seemed to be unmanned vessels deploying sea mines near the south east supply route.
vtolvrStrings.content: The troops you recovered from the crash site reported that they spotted what seemed to be unmanned vessels deploying sea mines near the south east supply route.

vtolvrStrings.description:
You will lead a strike group with the order of destroying all hostile targets in the designated area.  

Prepare your aircraft appropriately.
vtolvrStrings.content:
You will lead a strike group with the order of destroying all hostile targets in the designated area.  

Prepare your aircraft appropriately.

vtolvrStrings.description: Our engineers were able to salvage the navigation computers from the drone ships and used them to determine the location of the main naval fleet of the enemy.
vtolvrStrings.content: Our engineers were able to salvage the navigation computers from the drone ships and used them to determine the location of the main naval fleet of the enemy.

vtolvrStrings.description: We have tasked an aircraft carrier fleet to intercept before they get too close to the island.  In order to maximize their force, you and other pilots are ordered to join the fleet.
vtolvrStrings.content: We have tasked an aircraft carrier fleet to intercept before they get too close to the island.  In order to maximize their force, you and other pilots are ordered to join the fleet.

vtolvrStrings.description: A pilot belonging to the carrier was out on combat air patrol when his navigation systems experienced a failure.  The pilot is lost and low on fuel, so you must quickly find him and lead him to the fuel tanker on the way to the carrier.
vtolvrStrings.content: A pilot belonging to the carrier was out on combat air patrol when his navigation systems experienced a failure.  The pilot is lost and low on fuel, so you must quickly find him and lead him to the fuel tanker on the way to the carrier.

vtolvrStrings.description: We have intercepted the enemy fleet sooner than we expected to. They have already deployed aerial drones which are heading towards our fleet. All units are to scramble to defend the fleet, as well as quickly launch a counter-attack.
vtolvrStrings.content: We have intercepted the enemy fleet sooner than we expected to. They have already deployed aerial drones which are heading towards our fleet. All units are to scramble to defend the fleet, as well as quickly launch a counter-attack.

vtolvrStrings.description:
The enemy force is numerous and includes small drone boats, missile cruisers, and drone carriers. This is going to get messy.

Good luck.
vtolvrStrings.content:
The enemy force is numerous and includes small drone boats, missile cruisers, and drone carriers. This is going to get messy.

Good luck.

vtolvrStrings.description:
We received an encrypted message from the island airbase which suggested that a large presence was detected coming in from the north.

After that, all communications went silent.
vtolvrStrings.content:
We received an encrypted message from the island airbase which suggested that a large presence was detected coming in from the north.

After that, all communications went silent.

vtolvrStrings.description:
The captain is worried that the enemy fleet we just attacked was just a diversion, and a larger enemy fleet somehow sailed to the island undetected.

We are returning to the island to investigate the radio silence.
vtolvrStrings.content:
The captain is worried that the enemy fleet we just attacked was just a diversion, and a larger enemy fleet somehow sailed to the island undetected.

We are returning to the island to investigate the radio silence.

vtolvrStrings.description:
We are conserving on-board jet fuel in anticipation of responding to the potential threat, so the fighter escorts will need to refuel in the air.

Once everyone is topped off, scout the island and report back.  Good luck.
vtolvrStrings.content:
We are conserving on-board jet fuel in anticipation of responding to the potential threat, so the fighter escorts will need to refuel in the air.

Once everyone is topped off, scout the island and report back.  Good luck.

vtolvrStrings.description:
On the scouting sortie, a large enemy fleet was detected north of the island.  The enemy has also begun landing ground units on the island.

Before we can begin to move in and take back the island, we need to eliminate the threat posed by the enemy long range missile cruiser.
vtolvrStrings.content:
On the scouting sortie, a large enemy fleet was detected north of the island.  The enemy has also begun landing ground units on the island.

Before we can begin to move in and take back the island, we need to eliminate the threat posed by the enemy long range missile cruiser.

vtolvrStrings.description: The cruiser has an array of launch tubes which we believe are capable of deploying two-stage surface-to-air and anti-ship missiles.  It also has a vertical launching system defense cannons, so it may not be effective to use conventional bombs or air-to-ground missiles.
vtolvrStrings.content: The cruiser has an array of launch tubes which we believe are capable of deploying two-stage surface-to-air and anti-ship missiles.  It also has a vertical launching system defense cannons, so it may not be effective to use conventional bombs or air-to-ground missiles.

vtolvrStrings.description: In order to take out the threat, we are authorizing the use of the AGM-89 anti-ship cruise missile.  It has advanced features such as waypoint navigation, radar target acquisition, and a large payload.  Use it wisely and destroy the high priority target.
vtolvrStrings.content: In order to take out the threat, we are authorizing the use of the AGM-89 anti-ship cruise missile.  It has advanced features such as waypoint navigation, radar target acquisition, and a large payload.  Use it wisely and destroy the high priority target.

vtolvrStrings.description:
The mission launches at midnight. You will be escorted by a small wing of fighters to defend you from airborne threats.

The enemy has likely deployed more self-propelled SAM units to the island, so keep an eye out for missile launches and radar locks.

Good luck.
vtolvrStrings.content:
The mission launches at midnight. You will be escorted by a small wing of fighters to defend you from airborne threats.

The enemy has likely deployed more self-propelled SAM units to the island, so keep an eye out for missile launches and radar locks.

Good luck.

vtolvrStrings.description:
With the destruction of the enemy fleet's most powerful ship, we can begin an effort to take back the island.

Through the night, the enemy has continued to deploy troops and set up defenses around the island.
vtolvrStrings.content:
With the destruction of the enemy fleet's most powerful ship, we can begin an effort to take back the island.

Through the night, the enemy has continued to deploy troops and set up defenses around the island.

vtolvrStrings.description:
The first order is to clear out enemy units from the island airbase. Air defenses have been set up, so be prepared to use the surrounding hills for cover.

Once the airbase has been cleared, we can use it for refueling and rearming.
vtolvrStrings.content:
The first order is to clear out enemy units from the island airbase. Air defenses have been set up, so be prepared to use the surrounding hills for cover.

Once the airbase has been cleared, we can use it for refueling and rearming.

vtolvrStrings.description:
Once that is out of the way, we must eliminate the rest of the enemy fleet parked off the norther coast.

An allied carrier fleet is arriving from the east to support us, but are unable to launch aircraft due to enemy air defenses in the eastern city.
vtolvrStrings.content:
Once that is out of the way, we must eliminate the rest of the enemy fleet parked off the norther coast.

An allied carrier fleet is arriving from the east to support us, but are unable to launch aircraft due to enemy air defenses in the eastern city.

vtolvrStrings.description:
Destroy the eastern air defenses to allow the allied pilots to take off, then make a combined effort to destroy the enemy fleet.

The allied fleet will also move into firing range to support with anti-ship missiles.
vtolvrStrings.content:
Destroy the eastern air defenses to allow the allied pilots to take off, then make a combined effort to destroy the enemy fleet.

The allied fleet will also move into firing range to support with anti-ship missiles.

vtolvrStrings.description:
You are stationed at our most remote airbase, closest to the enemy border.

The enemy seeks to destroy the airbase's supplies in order to prevent us from conducting airstrikes in this region.
vtolvrStrings.content:
You are stationed at our most remote airbase, closest to the enemy border.

The enemy seeks to destroy the airbase's supplies in order to prevent us from conducting airstrikes in this region.

vtolvrStrings.description:
Intel has revealed that the enemy has launched a multi-pronged effort to attack the airbase.

A small group of hostile self-propelled artillery have mobilized to get into firing range of our supply depots.
vtolvrStrings.content:
Intel has revealed that the enemy has launched a multi-pronged effort to attack the airbase.

A small group of hostile self-propelled artillery have mobilized to get into firing range of our supply depots.

vtolvrStrings.description:
While it will be necessary to destroy the artillery, we believe that the attack is aimed to distract us from a follow-up airstrike.

The type of attackers, their locations, and numbers are unknown at this time.
vtolvrStrings.content:
While it will be necessary to destroy the artillery, we believe that the attack is aimed to distract us from a follow-up airstrike.

The type of attackers, their locations, and numbers are unknown at this time.

vtolvrStrings.description:
An E-4 AWACS will be deployed in order to aid in locating the airborne threats.

Due to our proximity to enemy territory, the AWACS will be vulnerable.  Please defend it if necessary.
vtolvrStrings.content:
An E-4 AWACS will be deployed in order to aid in locating the airborne threats.

Due to our proximity to enemy territory, the AWACS will be vulnerable.  Please defend it if necessary.

vtolvrStrings.description:
SUMMARY:
Objective:
Defend airbase supply depots.

Known targets:
3x self-propelled artillery

Unknown targets:
Bombers and/or attack aircraft.
vtolvrStrings.content:
SUMMARY:
Objective:
Defend airbase supply depots.

Known targets:
3x self-propelled artillery

Unknown targets:
Bombers and/or attack aircraft.

vtolvrStrings.description:
Now's our chance to head back out and return the favor to the enemy.

They occupy two airbases -- one to the northeast, and one further due north.
vtolvrStrings.content:
Now's our chance to head back out and return the favor to the enemy.

They occupy two airbases -- one to the northeast, and one further due north.

vtolvrStrings.description:
You must destroy the 4 supply depots at each base, for a total of 8 targets.

The enemy is most likely expecting us, so they probably beefed up air defenses as well as numerous aircraft on patrol.

Use the cover of darkness and terrain to mask your approach to the targets.
vtolvrStrings.content:
You must destroy the 4 supply depots at each base, for a total of 8 targets.

The enemy is most likely expecting us, so they probably beefed up air defenses as well as numerous aircraft on patrol.

Use the cover of darkness and terrain to mask your approach to the targets.

vtolvrStrings.description:
We have gathered intel on the near exact locations of their supplies, which will be set as the objective waypoints.

How you want to attack is up to you.
I recommend to remain radar silent to avoid detection.
vtolvrStrings.content:
We have gathered intel on the near exact locations of their supplies, which will be set as the objective waypoints.

How you want to attack is up to you.
I recommend to remain radar silent to avoid detection.

vtolvrStrings.description:
SUMMARY:
Objective: 
- Destroy the 8 supply depots at each base (4 each).

Threats:
- Numerous radar and IR SAM sites
- Hostile combat air patrol
vtolvrStrings.content:
SUMMARY:
Objective: 
- Destroy the 8 supply depots at each base (4 each).

Threats:
- Numerous radar and IR SAM sites
- Hostile combat air patrol

vtolvrStrings.description:
You've been transferred to the airbase near Gloom Lake.  

This lake lies on another border between our nation and the enemy's, and is where they conduct tests on naval vessels and aircraft.
vtolvrStrings.content:
You've been transferred to the airbase near Gloom Lake.  

This lake lies on another border between our nation and the enemy's, and is where they conduct tests on naval vessels and aircraft.

vtolvrStrings.description:
There have been an unusually high number of enemy drones harassing us recently.  They fly dangerously close to our base and force us to take defensive measures.  

We believe that they're attempting to distract us while they test new military technologies.
vtolvrStrings.content:
There have been an unusually high number of enemy drones harassing us recently.  They fly dangerously close to our base and force us to take defensive measures.  

We believe that they're attempting to distract us while they test new military technologies.

vtolvrStrings.description:
In order to put a damper on their research efforts, we're sending out a group of F/A-26Bs configured to sink their test ships.

Although this is a testing area, the enemy ships are fully functional and armed.
vtolvrStrings.content:
In order to put a damper on their research efforts, we're sending out a group of F/A-26Bs configured to sink their test ships.

Although this is a testing area, the enemy ships are fully functional and armed.

vtolvrStrings.description:
You and your wingmen are tasked to destroy enemy air defenses and patrol aircraft, to allow the strikers to perform the anti-shipping attack.

The strikers will be in the air waiting for you.  Join them and escort them along their attack path.
vtolvrStrings.content:
You and your wingmen are tasked to destroy enemy air defenses and patrol aircraft, to allow the strikers to perform the anti-shipping attack.

The strikers will be in the air waiting for you.  Join them and escort them along their attack path.

vtolvrStrings.description:
When you reach the end of the attack path, the strikers will begin anti-shipping. Target radars to prevent them from defending against the attack.

Simultaneously, allied combat air patrol will be vectored to the area to help keep enemy aircraft away.
vtolvrStrings.content:
When you reach the end of the attack path, the strikers will begin anti-shipping. Target radars to prevent them from defending against the attack.

Simultaneously, allied combat air patrol will be vectored to the area to help keep enemy aircraft away.

Objective: Support strikers while they attack enemy ships.
- Suppress enemy air defenses
- Defend strikers from enemy air patrols

Primary Targets:
- Radars
- Aggressive Aircraft

Threats:
- Ships
- Aircraft
- SAMs
- AAA

vtolvrStrings.description:
A couple of bombers are returning from a long range mission.  Their fuel reserves are low, so we're sending out a KC-49 tanker to provide air-to-air refuelling.

We are concerned that enemy aircraft will intercept the tanker, which is where you and your wingmen come in.
vtolvrStrings.content:
A couple of bombers are returning from a long range mission.  Their fuel reserves are low, so we're sending out a KC-49 tanker to provide air-to-air refuelling.

We are concerned that enemy aircraft will intercept the tanker, which is where you and your wingmen come in.

vtolvrStrings.description:
Fly with the tanker and keep it safe. Maintain active radar and RWR so you are aware of hostiles. 

AWACs will also be available to help spot incoming threats.
vtolvrStrings.content:
Fly with the tanker and keep it safe. Maintain active radar and RWR so you are aware of hostiles. 

AWACs will also be available to help spot incoming threats.

vtolvrStrings.description:
SUMMARY
Objective: 
- Escort the tanker to the rendezvous.  
- Engage all hostile aircraft that approach.
- Mission complete when the tanker and bombers return to base.

Threats:
- Hostile aircraft
vtolvrStrings.content:
SUMMARY
Objective: 
- Escort the tanker to the rendezvous.  
- Engage all hostile aircraft that approach.
- Mission complete when the tanker and bombers return to base.

Threats:
- Hostile aircraft

vtolvrStrings.description:
It's time to send a naval strike group deep into enemy territory.  The aircraft carrier and its escorts will soon be ready to depart, but enemy forces are close.  

They will likely attempt to stop the carrier group before our mission can even begin.
vtolvrStrings.content:
It's time to send a naval strike group deep into enemy territory.  The aircraft carrier and its escorts will soon be ready to depart, but enemy forces are close.  

They will likely attempt to stop the carrier group before our mission can even begin.

vtolvrStrings.description:
Your job is to protect the ships, onboard aircraft, and the naval base from the enemy attack.  Hostile aircraft and land vehicles are approaching.  

Once the coast is clear, you will land on the carrier and join on the offensive.
vtolvrStrings.content:
Your job is to protect the ships, onboard aircraft, and the naval base from the enemy attack.  Hostile aircraft and land vehicles are approaching.  

Once the coast is clear, you will land on the carrier and join on the offensive.

vtolvrStrings.description:
SUMMARY

Objective:
- Defend naval strike group and naval base

Threats:
- Fighter Aircraft
- Bombers
- Tanks
- Mobile Anti-Air
vtolvrStrings.content:
SUMMARY

Objective:
- Defend naval strike group and naval base

Threats:
- Fighter Aircraft
- Bombers
- Tanks
- Mobile Anti-Air

vtolvrStrings.description:
The carrier group's first stop is a small northern island territory occupied by the enemy.

They have a few military bases here and use the island to stage their attacks on our western coast.
vtolvrStrings.content:
The carrier group's first stop is a small northern island territory occupied by the enemy.

They have a few military bases here and use the island to stage their attacks on our western coast.

vtolvrStrings.description:
The island is a valuable asset to the enemy's air and naval forces, so it's our duty to halt their operations here.

We will launch a full on air assault.
vtolvrStrings.content:
The island is a valuable asset to the enemy's air and naval forces, so it's our duty to halt their operations here.

We will launch a full on air assault.

vtolvrStrings.description:
There are 4 major components to the attack, which will be split up among 4 specialized air groups.

Whiskey group will suppress enemy air defenses. X-ray group will attack ground targets such as armored vehicles and supply depots.  Bravo will sink the enemy ships.
vtolvrStrings.content:
There are 4 major components to the attack, which will be split up among 4 specialized air groups.

Whiskey group will suppress enemy air defenses. X-ray group will attack ground targets such as armored vehicles and supply depots.  Bravo will sink the enemy ships.

vtolvrStrings.description:
Kilo group, your group, will fly combat air patrol and keep the enemy fighters away from the other groups.

The enemy only has a few groups of fighters in the air, but they have a carrier full of aircraft ready to go, and an airbase not far from our point of entry.
vtolvrStrings.content:
Kilo group, your group, will fly combat air patrol and keep the enemy fighters away from the other groups.

The enemy only has a few groups of fighters in the air, but they have a carrier full of aircraft ready to go, and an airbase not far from our point of entry.

vtolvrStrings.description: All groups will maintain open communications, but you will only have command over your own group.  Focus on your own objective (CAP) but maintain awareness of the bigger picture.
vtolvrStrings.content: All groups will maintain open communications, but you will only have command over your own group.  Focus on your own objective (CAP) but maintain awareness of the bigger picture.

vtolvrStrings.description:
SUMMARY

Objective:
- Combat air patrol

Targets:
- Multiple hostile aircraft

Threats:
- Hostile Aircraft
- SAMs
- Ships
vtolvrStrings.content:
SUMMARY

Objective:
- Combat air patrol

Targets:
- Multiple hostile aircraft

Threats:
- Hostile Aircraft
- SAMs
- Ships

vtolvrStrings.description:
We have located the enemy's main source of oil off the shore of some remote islands.  

The carrier group has been sent to destroy the oil platforms and further reduce the enemy's ability to fuel war.
vtolvrStrings.content:
We have located the enemy's main source of oil off the shore of some remote islands.  

The carrier group has been sent to destroy the oil platforms and further reduce the enemy's ability to fuel war.

vtolvrStrings.description:
There seems to be an unusually high naval military presence here, so the guided missile cruisers will be assisting your attack.

Air groups X-ray and Sierra will be primarily focused on SEAD, while Bravo will provide CAP.
vtolvrStrings.content:
There seems to be an unusually high naval military presence here, so the guided missile cruisers will be assisting your attack.

Air groups X-ray and Sierra will be primarily focused on SEAD, while Bravo will provide CAP.

vtolvrStrings.description:
Your group, Kilo, will be responsible for striking the oil platforms.

We need the platforms to be destroyed beyond all repair, so you can either destroy all key components on the platform, or destroy two support pillars to topple the entire platform.
vtolvrStrings.content:
Your group, Kilo, will be responsible for striking the oil platforms.

We need the platforms to be destroyed beyond all repair, so you can either destroy all key components on the platform, or destroy two support pillars to topple the entire platform.

vtolvrStrings.description:
Our cruisers will approach from the north, on the western side of the ridge. 

The air groups will approach on the eastern side of the ridge at low altitude. You should remain undetected until you reach the channel.
vtolvrStrings.content:
Our cruisers will approach from the north, on the western side of the ridge. 

The air groups will approach on the eastern side of the ridge at low altitude. You should remain undetected until you reach the channel.

vtolvrStrings.description:
The SEAD attack from the east should occur at the same time that the cruiser anti-ship missiles reach the enemy.

This will keep their defenses saturated while Kilo comes in to take down the oil platforms.
vtolvrStrings.content:
The SEAD attack from the east should occur at the same time that the cruiser anti-ship missiles reach the enemy.

This will keep their defenses saturated while Kilo comes in to take down the oil platforms.

vtolvrStrings.description: There may be other ground targets for you, but we will keep you updated on those as we acquire more information.
vtolvrStrings.content: There may be other ground targets for you, but we will keep you updated on those as we acquire more information.

vtolvrStrings.description:
SUMMARY

Objective:
- Destroy 4 oil platforms

Threats
- Ships
- SAMs
- Aircraft
vtolvrStrings.content:
SUMMARY

Objective:
- Destroy 4 oil platforms

Threats
- Ships
- SAMs
- Aircraft

vtolvrStrings.description:
This mission will have two phases.
On the first phase, Kilo 1-1 will lead the flight into enemy territory.

You will be Kilo 1-2, and are assigned to support the flight lead.  Execute her commands to destroy secondary targets on the way to the enemy base.
vtolvrStrings.content:
This mission will have two phases.
On the first phase, Kilo 1-1 will lead the flight into enemy territory.

You will be Kilo 1-2, and are assigned to support the flight lead.  Execute her commands to destroy secondary targets on the way to the enemy base.

vtolvrStrings.description:
The mission is scheduled to start when one of the enemy's coastal defense sites goes down temporarily.

We expect the defenses to resume operation when they spot your approach, but at least it will give you an opportunity to disable them before they can acquire you.
vtolvrStrings.content:
The mission is scheduled to start when one of the enemy's coastal defense sites goes down temporarily.

We expect the defenses to resume operation when they spot your approach, but at least it will give you an opportunity to disable them before they can acquire you.

vtolvrStrings.description:
The flight path will be low, weaving through the valleys to avoid line of sight with enemy radar.

Maintain formation with Kilo 1 for the entirety of the ingress phase.
vtolvrStrings.content:
The flight path will be low, weaving through the valleys to avoid line of sight with enemy radar.

Maintain formation with Kilo 1 for the entirety of the ingress phase.

vtolvrStrings.description:
The secondary targets are coastal defenses at Alpha and two IR SAM units at Bravo. Destroying them will help clear the way for the bomber. 

Again, flight leader Kilo 1-1 will call the shots on these targets.
vtolvrStrings.content:
The secondary targets are coastal defenses at Alpha and two IR SAM units at Bravo. Destroying them will help clear the way for the bomber. 

Again, flight leader Kilo 1-1 will call the shots on these targets.

vtolvrStrings.description:
The primary objective will begin when you reach the base at Charlie.

Allied rocket artillery will be in the area launching strikes on the base's air defenses.
vtolvrStrings.content:
The primary objective will begin when you reach the base at Charlie.

Allied rocket artillery will be in the area launching strikes on the base's air defenses.

vtolvrStrings.description:
The primary targets are rows of cylindrical tents lined up from east to west.

Your flight path will allow you to strike multiple targets in a single low-altitude bombing pass.
vtolvrStrings.content:
The primary targets are rows of cylindrical tents lined up from east to west.

Your flight path will allow you to strike multiple targets in a single low-altitude bombing pass.

vtolvrStrings.description: After the first pass, flight lead duties will be passed over to you (Kilo 1-2).  Lead your wingmen to take down the remaining targets.
vtolvrStrings.content: After the first pass, flight lead duties will be passed over to you (Kilo 1-2).  Lead your wingmen to take down the remaining targets.

vtolvrStrings.description:
A group of F-45A's will take off from a nearby FARP to help keep enemy aircraft and other threats off of you and your wingmen.

Once primary targets have been destroyed, an AV-42C will also dispatch from here to deliver troops to the headquarters and capture the enemy leaders.
vtolvrStrings.content:
A group of F-45A's will take off from a nearby FARP to help keep enemy aircraft and other threats off of you and your wingmen.

Once primary targets have been destroyed, an AV-42C will also dispatch from here to deliver troops to the headquarters and capture the enemy leaders.

vtolvrStrings.description:
You will be tasked to protect them at that time, but we'll update you on that final operation when we get to it.

Focus on supporting your wingmen during the flight through hostile territory and destroying the primary targets.
vtolvrStrings.content:
You will be tasked to protect them at that time, but we'll update you on that final operation when we get to it.

Focus on supporting your wingmen during the flight through hostile territory and destroying the primary targets.

vtolvrStrings.description:
SUMMARY

OBJECTIVES
-  Clear air defenses for bombers
- *Destroy enemy assets
-  Protect troop transport

THREATS
- IR and Radar SAMs
- Aircraft
vtolvrStrings.content:
SUMMARY

OBJECTIVES

vtolvrStrings.description: A small collection of quick missions for the F-45A.
vtolvrStrings.content: A small collection of quick missions for the F-45A.

vtolvrStrings.description: Take the lead on this two-part mission to take down hostile bombers.
vtolvrStrings.content: Take the lead on this two-part mission to take down hostile bombers.

vtolvrStrings.description: Destroy the long range MAD-4 Radar (M4) near the airbase.
vtolvrStrings.content: Destroy the long range MAD-4 Radar (M4) near the airbase.

vtolvrStrings.description: Destroy the fighters taking off from the base with the help of India group.
vtolvrStrings.content: Destroy the fighters taking off from the base with the help of India group.

vtolvrStrings.description: Destroy bombers taking off from second airbase.
vtolvrStrings.content: Destroy bombers taking off from second airbase.

vtolvrStrings.description: Attack high value targets in an attack on enemy territory.
vtolvrStrings.content: Attack high value targets in an attack on enemy territory.

vtolvrStrings.description: Locate and destroy the command & control bunkers
vtolvrStrings.content: Locate and destroy the command & control bunkers

vtolvrStrings.description: Destroy the artillery attacking our ships.
vtolvrStrings.content: Destroy the artillery attacking our ships.

vtolvrStrings.description: Find and destroy the highly capable enemy stealth fighters.
vtolvrStrings.content: Find and destroy the highly capable enemy stealth fighters.

vtolvrStrings.description: Find and destroy the enemy bomber aircraft.
vtolvrStrings.content: Find and destroy the enemy bomber aircraft.

vtolvrStrings.description: Do not let the enemy destroy either of our carriers!
vtolvrStrings.content: Do not let the enemy destroy either of our carriers!

vtolvrStrings.description: Practice arrested or vertical landings on a moving carrier.
vtolvrStrings.content: Practice arrested or vertical landings on a moving carrier.

vtolvrStrings.description: Search for and destroy enemy weapon caches. Avoid detection or pay the price. Once they know where you are, they'll do anything to stop you.
vtolvrStrings.content: Search for and destroy enemy weapon caches. Avoid detection or pay the price. Once they know where you are, they'll do anything to stop you.

vtolvrStrings.description: Find and destroy enemy weapon caches. Locations unknown.
vtolvrStrings.content: Find and destroy enemy weapon caches. Locations unknown.

vtolvrStrings.description: Return to and land on the helipad.
vtolvrStrings.content: Return to and land on the helipad.

vtolvrStrings.description:
You will be the first to launch from the carrier.

Destroy the long range air defenses at the enemy coastal airbase Alpha first so that we can launch fighters.
vtolvrStrings.content:
You will be the first to launch from the carrier.

Destroy the long range air defenses at the enemy coastal airbase Alpha first so that we can launch fighters.

vtolvrStrings.description: Once the air defenses are destroyed, CAP group India will launch from the carrier to help you clean up the enemy fighters.
vtolvrStrings.content: Once the air defenses are destroyed, CAP group India will launch from the carrier to help you clean up the enemy fighters.

vtolvrStrings.description:
After clearing the fighters, land at the FARP to reconfigure for a purely air-to-air role. You will be joined by another F-45 to take down the enemy bombers taking off from airbase Bravo.

SEAD group Romeo will launch from the carrier to disable the SAM sites at Bravo.
vtolvrStrings.content:
After clearing the fighters, land at the FARP to reconfigure for a purely air-to-air role. You will be joined by another F-45 to take down the enemy bombers taking off from airbase Bravo.

SEAD group Romeo will launch from the carrier to disable the SAM sites at Bravo.

vtolvrStrings.description: Destroy the two bombers from Bravo then return to carrier to complete the mission!
vtolvrStrings.content: Destroy the two bombers from Bravo then return to carrier to complete the mission!

vtolvrStrings.description:
Complete all of the objectives, then return to the assault carrier.

You can complete them in any order you choose.

There's a mix of hardened surface targets and air targets.
vtolvrStrings.content:
Complete all of the objectives, then return to the assault carrier.

You can complete them in any order you choose.

There's a mix of hardened surface targets and air targets.

vtolvrStrings.description:
Enemy rocket artillery have moved into range and have begun firing on our fleet from the other side of a mountain.

They have a low hit probability, but we must destroy them.
vtolvrStrings.content:
Enemy rocket artillery have moved into range and have begun firing on our fleet from the other side of a mountain.

They have a low hit probability, but we must destroy them.

vtolvrStrings.description: Enemy bombers have also been known to operate from this area. If they decide to deploy them against our assault fleet, they will be a high priority target.
vtolvrStrings.content: Enemy bombers have also been known to operate from this area. If they decide to deploy them against our assault fleet, they will be a high priority target.

vtolvrStrings.description: We have little intel on their whereabouts, but a handful of enemy stealth fighters are stationed by the bay and must be destroyed.
vtolvrStrings.content: We have little intel on their whereabouts, but a handful of enemy stealth fighters are stationed by the bay and must be destroyed.

vtolvrStrings.description: Finally, you must find the enemy command post and destroy the two bunkers. The bunkers will likely be adjacent to large supply tents.
vtolvrStrings.content: Finally, you must find the enemy command post and destroy the two bunkers. The bunkers will likely be adjacent to large supply tents.

vtolvrStrings.description: Enemy bases are well defended, so use caution when operating near them.
vtolvrStrings.content: Enemy bases are well defended, so use caution when operating near them.

vtolvrStrings.description: The mission will be considered a failure if either of our carriers are destroyed.
vtolvrStrings.content: The mission will be considered a failure if either of our carriers are destroyed.

vtolvrStrings.description:
No objectives or enemies.

You will start at 300kts, 1000ft above two carriers.  Contact one of them to request clearance to land.
vtolvrStrings.content:
No objectives or enemies.

You will start at 300kts, 1000ft above two carriers.  Contact one of them to request clearance to land.

vtolvrStrings.description: You are stationed at small FARP (forward arming and refueling point) near an enemy airbase.  Unfortunately, you only have enough supplies for one last sortie, and it's a tough one.
vtolvrStrings.content: You are stationed at small FARP (forward arming and refueling point) near an enemy airbase.  Unfortunately, you only have enough supplies for one last sortie, and it's a tough one.

vtolvrStrings.description: The mission is to destroy 3 enemy weapon caches.  We don't know exactly where they are, but they are most likely near air defenses.  Based on their radar emissions, we have estimated the positions of 4 sites.  The caches may all be at one site, or spread out between them.
vtolvrStrings.content: The mission is to destroy 3 enemy weapon caches.  We don't know exactly where they are, but they are most likely near air defenses.  Based on their radar emissions, we have estimated the positions of 4 sites.  The caches may all be at one site, or spread out between them.

vtolvrStrings.description: You don't have any support on this mission.  No extra fuel, no rearming, no wingmen, nothing.  With scattered SAM sites and numerous enemy air patrols, the odds are stacked against you.  Use stealthy tactics to maneuver around the area and destroy the targets.
vtolvrStrings.content: You don't have any support on this mission.  No extra fuel, no rearming, no wingmen, nothing.  With scattered SAM sites and numerous enemy air patrols, the odds are stacked against you.  Use stealthy tactics to maneuver around the area and destroy the targets.

vtolvrStrings.description:
SUMMARY:
Objective:
  - Destroy the 3 weapon caches (supply tents)

Threats:
  - SAMs
  - Patrolling aircraft
vtolvrStrings.content:
SUMMARY:
Objective:
  - Destroy the 3 weapon caches (supply tents)

Threats:

vtolvrStrings.description:
Welcome!

I know you've been itching for a bit of action so I have a few tasks lined up for you today.

Let's get started.

Welcome!

vtolvrStrings.description:
A huge mountain range divides us from the enemy territory, so we usually don't get too much activity in the area.

Recently we began spotting small groups passing through and setting up small camps on our side of the ridge.
vtolvrStrings.content:
A huge mountain range divides us from the enemy territory, so we usually don't get too much activity in the area.

Recently we began spotting small groups passing through and setting up small camps on our side of the ridge.

vtolvrStrings.description:
They appear to be setting up forward operating bases to service their VTOL capable attack aircraft.

They are still early in the preparation stage so we should attack now before they get too fortified.
vtolvrStrings.content:
They appear to be setting up forward operating bases to service their VTOL capable attack aircraft.

vtolvrStrings.description:

Their locations are available in the objective data.
vtolvrStrings.content:
We currently have positive intel on two camps.  We know where they are, and that they're only equipped with small arms, so this should be a breeze for you.

After you clear out those sites, there will be one more matter we need to look into.  

We are aware of transport activity in the high mountain region so we'll have you go and perform some recon.  Be sure to bring enough fuel.

vtolvrStrings.content:
The city has been overrun by the enemy. They've taken complete control and have set up a makeshift HQ at the city center.

Most of the civillians have been evacuated, however a small group is trapped in one of the industrial buildings.

vtolvrStrings.description: Our main goal today is to get those civillians to safety, but there are a few steps we need to take in order to do that.
vtolvrStrings.content: Our main goal today is to get those civillians to safety, but there are a few steps we need to take in order to do that.

vtolvrStrings.description:
A pair enemy ground attack aircraft are patrolling the area.  They need to be destroyed before we can begin the rescue operation.

We would send in fighters to take care of them but the enemy have strong air defenses.
vtolvrStrings.content:
A pair enemy ground attack aircraft are patrolling the area.  They need to be destroyed before we can begin the rescue operation.

We would send in fighters to take care of them but the enemy have strong air defenses.

vtolvrStrings.description:
This is where you will begin.

Destroy the MAD-4 units around the city, as well as the long range anti-air missile systems on the ships parked off the coast.

This will allow us to send the fighters to gain air superiority.
vtolvrStrings.content:
This is where you will begin.

Destroy the MAD-4 units around the city, as well as the long range anti-air missile systems on the ships parked off the coast.

This will allow us to send the fighters to gain air superiority.

vtolvrStrings.description:
Once the air defenses and air patrol are destroyed, special forces unit Bravo will enter the city by road vehicles.

You will need to provide close air support and clear their way through the city streets.
vtolvrStrings.content:
Once the air defenses and air patrol are destroyed, special forces unit Bravo will enter the city by road vehicles.

You will need to provide close air support and clear their way through the city streets.

vtolvrStrings.description: Finally, while we have you on station and are maintaining air superiority, we need you to find the HQ that the enemy has set up downtown.  They are storing valuable supplies and equipment there, so destroy everything you find.
vtolvrStrings.content: Finally, while we have you on station and are maintaining air superiority, we need you to find the HQ that the enemy has set up downtown.  They are storing valuable supplies and equipment there, so destroy everything you find.

 2. Destroy enemy aircraft (with help)
 3. Escort Bravo on rescue mission
 4. Find and destroy assets at enemy HQ
Threats
- SAMs, infantry, attack aircraft

vtolvrStrings.description:
Tonight, we're taking on a daring but crucial mission.

It's time to stop enemy's reign of terror.

We'll be launching from the carrier at midnight.
vtolvrStrings.content:
Tonight, we're taking on a daring but crucial mission.

It's time to stop enemy's reign of terror.

We'll be launching from the carrier at midnight.

vtolvrStrings.description: The enemy leaders have been highly elusive, but thanks to our network of informants, we have intel that all of the top officials will be in Pike City to oversee an inspection of 5 new warships.
vtolvrStrings.content: The enemy leaders have been highly elusive, but thanks to our network of informants, we have intel that all of the top officials will be in Pike City to oversee an inspection of 5 new warships.

vtolvrStrings.description:
The city, and the harbor especially, are heavily defended, but we can't pass up this opportunity.

Move towards the harbor, delaying detection as long as possible.  The moment they know we're here, the leaders will attempt to flee the city.
vtolvrStrings.content:
The city, and the harbor especially, are heavily defended, but we can't pass up this opportunity.

Move towards the harbor, delaying detection as long as possible.  The moment they know we're here, the leaders will attempt to flee the city.

vtolvrStrings.description: The primary objective is to assassinate the leaders, who will be riding in 3 armored personnel carriers (APCs).
vtolvrStrings.content: The primary objective is to assassinate the leaders, who will be riding in 3 armored personnel carriers (APCs).

vtolvrStrings.description: We are also aware that mobile artillery units, both land and sea, are ready to deploy when provoked, so we must find them and destroy them before they can fire on our ships.
vtolvrStrings.content: We are also aware that mobile artillery units, both land and sea, are ready to deploy when provoked, so we must find them and destroy them before they can fire on our ships.

vtolvrStrings.description: Find and assassinate the leaders, destroy the artillery boats and trucks, then return to the carrier.

vtolvrStrings.description:
Welcome!

I know you've been itching for a bit of action so I have a few tasks lined up for you today.

Let's get started.
vtolvrStrings.content:
Welcome!

I know you've been itching for a bit of action so I have a few tasks lined up for you today.

Let's get started.

vtolvrStrings.description:
A huge mountain range divides us from the enemy territory, so we usually don't get too much activity in the area.

Recently we began spotting small groups passing through and setting up small camps on our side of the ridge.
vtolvrStrings.content:
A huge mountain range divides us from the enemy territory, so we usually don't get too much activity in the area.

Recently we began spotting small groups passing through and setting up small camps on our side of the ridge.

vtolvrStrings.description:
They appear to be setting up forward operating bases to service their VTOL capable attack aircraft.

They are still early in the preparation stage so we should attack now before they get too fortified.
vtolvrStrings.content:
They appear to be setting up forward operating bases to service their VTOL capable attack aircraft.

They are still early in the preparation stage so we should attack now before they get too fortified.

vtolvrStrings.description:
We currently have positive intel on two camps.  We know where they are, and that they're only equipped with small arms, so this should be a breeze for you.

Their locations are available in the objective data.
vtolvrStrings.content:
We currently have positive intel on two camps.  We know where they are, and that they're only equipped with small arms, so this should be a breeze for you.

Their locations are available in the objective data.

vtolvrStrings.description:
After you clear out those sites, there will be one more matter we need to look into.  

We are aware of transport activity in the high mountain region so we'll have you go and perform some recon.  Be sure to bring enough fuel.
vtolvrStrings.content:
After you clear out those sites, there will be one more matter we need to look into.  

We are aware of transport activity in the high mountain region so we'll have you go and perform some recon.  Be sure to bring enough fuel.

vtolvrStrings.description:
Absolutely never go beyond the mountain range and into the plains.

Beyond that point is the enemy territory which is heavily defended by long range air defenses and fighters.
vtolvrStrings.content:
Absolutely never go beyond the mountain range and into the plains.

Beyond that point is the enemy territory which is heavily defended by long range air defenses and fighters.

vtolvrStrings.description:
Summary
 Objectives
 - Destroy all targets at sites A and B
 - Perform recon in the high mountains
 Threats
 - Small arms fire
- MANPADS
vtolvrStrings.content:

 Objectives

vtolvrStrings.description:
For this mission, you will need to act quickly and quietly.

The enemy plans to launch several groups of aircraft from their base.

Your objective is to destroy all of these aircraft before they take off.
vtolvrStrings.content:
For this mission, you will need to act quickly and quietly.

The enemy plans to launch several groups of aircraft from their base.

Your objective is to destroy all of these aircraft before they take off.

vtolvrStrings.description:
You will be taking off from a forward arming and refueling point (FARP) about 30 miles from the target.

Fly low and make your way to the to the airbase undetected.
vtolvrStrings.content:
You will be taking off from a forward arming and refueling point (FARP) about 30 miles from the target.

Fly low and make your way to the to the airbase undetected.

vtolvrStrings.description:
A bomber is inbound to land at the airbase.  After it lands, the enemy fighters will begin to take off.  

You will have this window to strike while all aircraft are still on the ground.
vtolvrStrings.content:
A bomber is inbound to land at the airbase.  After it lands, the enemy fighters will begin to take off.  

You will have this window to strike while all aircraft are still on the ground.

vtolvrStrings.description: Beware that if they spot you before you are ready to attack, they may launch preemptively to defend themselves.
vtolvrStrings.content: Beware that if they spot you before you are ready to attack, they may launch preemptively to defend themselves.
