vtolvrStrings.description: Welcome to the air-to-ground missile tutorial!
vtolvrStrings.content: Welcome to the air-to-ground missile tutorial!

vtolvrStrings.description: Air-to-ground missiles (AGM) are useful for precisely hitting light to medium armored ground targets
vtolvrStrings.content: Air-to-ground missiles (AGM) are useful for precisely hitting light to medium armored ground targets

vtolvrStrings.description: You will use the TGP to designate targets for the AGMs
vtolvrStrings.content: You will use the TGP to designate targets for the AGMs

vtolvrStrings.description: These are small, laser-guided, anti-tank missiles
vtolvrStrings.content: These are small, laser-guided, anti-tank missiles

vtolvrStrings.description: Since they home in on the laser point emitted by your TGP, you must maintain line of sight to the target until it hits
vtolvrStrings.content: Since they home in on the laser point emitted by your TGP, you must maintain line of sight to the target until it hits

vtolvrStrings.description: To fire it, designate a target using the TGP, point your aircraft at the target until the missile locks on, then pull the trigger to fire
vtolvrStrings.content: To fire it, designate a target using the TGP, point your aircraft at the target until the missile locks on, then pull the trigger to fire

vtolvrStrings.description: You can also switch the missile seeker's uncage mode to MANUAL, which will allow you to fire at targets off boresight
vtolvrStrings.content: You can also switch the missile seeker's uncage mode to MANUAL, which will allow you to fire at targets off boresight

vtolvrStrings.description: In MANUAL mode, you hold the trigger to uncage the seeker, then press the weapon switch button to fire
vtolvrStrings.content: In MANUAL mode, you hold the trigger to uncage the seeker, then press the weapon switch button to fire

vtolvrStrings.description: Try shooting the targets around the mission waypoint using the AGM-114
vtolvrStrings.content: Try shooting the targets around the mission waypoint using the AGM-114

vtolvrStrings.description: Remember, you need to maintain line of sight with your TGP in order to guide the missile to the target
vtolvrStrings.content: Remember, you need to maintain line of sight with your TGP in order to guide the missile to the target

vtolvrStrings.description: Great! Now switch to the AGM-65
vtolvrStrings.content: Great! Now switch to the AGM-65

vtolvrStrings.description: This is a larger, slightly heavier hitting anti-tank missile with a more advanced optical seeker
vtolvrStrings.content: This is a larger, slightly heavier hitting anti-tank missile with a more advanced optical seeker

vtolvrStrings.description: With this type of missile, you do not need to maintain a lock on the target after you fire at it
vtolvrStrings.content: With this type of missile, you do not need to maintain a lock on the target after you fire at it

vtolvrStrings.description: The fire-and-forget capability allows you to fire at multiple targets in one pass, or take cover after firing
vtolvrStrings.content: The fire-and-forget capability allows you to fire at multiple targets in one pass, or take cover after firing

vtolvrStrings.description: Try taking down the targets at the next waypoint and practice taking advantage of the fire-and-forget capability
vtolvrStrings.content: Try taking down the targets at the next waypoint and practice taking advantage of the fire-and-forget capability

vtolvrStrings.description: Nice shooting!  This concludes the air-to-ground missile tutorial
vtolvrStrings.content: Nice shooting!  This concludes the air-to-ground missile tutorial

vtolvrStrings.description: Welcome to the Radar tutorial for the F/A-26
vtolvrStrings.content: Welcome to the Radar tutorial for the F/A-26

vtolvrStrings.description: Today, you will learn how to use the radar to find and track other aircraft, as well as designate targets for air to air missiles
vtolvrStrings.content: Today, you will learn how to use the radar to find and track other aircraft, as well as designate targets for air to air missiles

vtolvrStrings.description: The display shows you a compressed representation of the radar's 120 degree field of view
vtolvrStrings.content: The display shows you a compressed representation of the radar's 120 degree field of view

vtolvrStrings.description: The displayed range can be adjusted using the R+ and R- buttons
vtolvrStrings.content: The displayed range can be adjusted using the R+ and R- buttons

vtolvrStrings.description: Press R+ repeatedly until the display is at max range
vtolvrStrings.content: Press R+ repeatedly until the display is at max range

vtolvrStrings.description: As the radar sweeps over other aircraft, they will be displayed as blue icons for friends and orange icons for foes
vtolvrStrings.content: As the radar sweeps over other aircraft, they will be displayed as blue icons for friends and orange icons for foes

vtolvrStrings.description: The left/right SCAN ANGLE can also be adjusted to allow the radar to scan more rapidly but in a smaller slice of the sky
vtolvrStrings.content: The left/right SCAN ANGLE can also be adjusted to allow the radar to scan more rapidly but in a smaller slice of the sky

vtolvrStrings.description: Now, you can slew the target designator using the joystick's thumb control
vtolvrStrings.content: Now, you can slew the target designator using the joystick's thumb control

vtolvrStrings.description: Slew the designator over a contact, and press in on the center of the thumb control to start tracking it
vtolvrStrings.content: Slew the designator over a contact, and press in on the center of the thumb control to start tracking it

vtolvrStrings.description: You can track up to 4 contacts while still being able to scan the rest of the sky
vtolvrStrings.content: You can track up to 4 contacts while still being able to scan the rest of the sky

vtolvrStrings.description: They will appear as small circle on your HUD, along with their corresponding number
vtolvrStrings.content: They will appear as small circle on your HUD, along with their corresponding number

vtolvrStrings.description: In order to lock a target for weapons, click on a track again using the designator, or press the numbered MFD button on the left
vtolvrStrings.content: In order to lock a target for weapons, click on a track again using the designator, or press the numbered MFD button on the left

vtolvrStrings.description: While a target is locked, the other tracks will continue to be displayed, but the radar will not be able to scan for new targets
vtolvrStrings.content: While a target is locked, the other tracks will continue to be displayed, but the radar will not be able to scan for new targets

vtolvrStrings.description: Information about the locked target's bearing, range, altitude, airspeed, and aircraft type will appear on the bottom right of the display
vtolvrStrings.content: Information about the locked target's bearing, range, altitude, airspeed, and aircraft type will appear on the bottom right of the display

vtolvrStrings.description: Use the UNLCK button to unlock the target, and the CLR button to clear the tracks
vtolvrStrings.content: Use the UNLCK button to unlock the target, and the CLR button to clear the tracks

vtolvrStrings.description: For close in engagements, the radar can be switched to boresight mode using the MODE button
vtolvrStrings.content: For close in engagements, the radar can be switched to boresight mode using the MODE button

vtolvrStrings.description: In this mode, the radar will point straight forward and lock onto the first contact it sees
vtolvrStrings.content: In this mode, the radar will point straight forward and lock onto the first contact it sees

vtolvrStrings.description: If the radar is SOI, you can press the joystick thumb control to quickly unlock and find a new target
vtolvrStrings.content: If the radar is SOI, you can press the joystick thumb control to quickly unlock and find a new target

vtolvrStrings.description: Now for some weapons practice. Go back to scan mode and find, track, and lock the enemy aircraft.
vtolvrStrings.content: Now for some weapons practice. Go back to scan mode and find, track, and lock the enemy aircraft.

vtolvrStrings.description: Good. Now arm your weapon system and switch to the AIM-120
vtolvrStrings.content: Good. Now arm your weapon system and switch to the AIM-120

vtolvrStrings.description: On the HUD, the locked target will appear as a small square.  The small dot is the shot lead cue
vtolvrStrings.content: On the HUD, the locked target will appear as a small square.  The small dot is the shot lead cue

vtolvrStrings.description: When firing air to air missiles, aim for the lead cue to help the missile conserve energy as it steers toward the target
vtolvrStrings.content: When firing air to air missiles, aim for the lead cue to help the missile conserve energy as it steers toward the target

vtolvrStrings.description: The DLZ is displayed on the right side of the HUD. The missile should be fired when the target chevron lies between the min and max marks
vtolvrStrings.content: The DLZ is displayed on the right side of the HUD. The missile should be fired when the target chevron lies between the min and max marks

vtolvrStrings.description: By tracking multiple contacts, you can fire up to 4 AIM-120s on separate targets as long as you maintain line of sight with each of them
vtolvrStrings.content: By tracking multiple contacts, you can fire up to 4 AIM-120s on separate targets as long as you maintain line of sight with each of them

vtolvrStrings.description: When the AIM-120's time to impact counter displays the letter M, it has switched to active homing and you no longer need to track it.
vtolvrStrings.content: When the AIM-120's time to impact counter displays the letter M, it has switched to active homing and you no longer need to track it.

vtolvrStrings.description: Now, try shooting down the rest of the enemy air targets.
vtolvrStrings.content: Now, try shooting down the rest of the enemy air targets.

vtolvrStrings.description: Out of missiles!  You hit some of the targets though!
vtolvrStrings.content: Out of missiles!  You hit some of the targets though!

vtolvrStrings.description: Out of missiles!  You didn't hit anything.  Want to try again?
vtolvrStrings.content: Out of missiles!  You didn't hit anything.  Want to try again?

vtolvrStrings.description: SEAD stands for Suppression of Enemy Air Defenses
vtolvrStrings.content: SEAD stands for Suppression of Enemy Air Defenses

vtolvrStrings.description: You will use a combination of radar detecting sensors and special weapons to disable SAM sites
vtolvrStrings.content: You will use a combination of radar detecting sensors and special weapons to disable SAM sites

vtolvrStrings.description: When a radar is searching for aircraft, it emits a signal that can be detected by your RWR
vtolvrStrings.content: When a radar is searching for aircraft, it emits a signal that can be detected by your RWR

vtolvrStrings.description: The radar type, bearing, and approximate range is shown on the RWR display, relative to your position in the center
vtolvrStrings.content: The radar type, bearing, and approximate range is shown on the RWR display, relative to your position in the center

vtolvrStrings.description: This display shows the same information gathered by the RWR, but allows you to select targets for ARMs
vtolvrStrings.content: This display shows the same information gathered by the RWR, but allows you to select targets for ARMs

vtolvrStrings.description: You can also set radar sources to be displayed as diamonds in the HUD
vtolvrStrings.content: You can also set radar sources to be displayed as diamonds in the HUD

vtolvrStrings.description: When you lower the AR visor, you'll be able to see all of the targets around you for better situational awareness
vtolvrStrings.content: When you lower the AR visor, you'll be able to see all of the targets around you for better situational awareness

vtolvrStrings.description: Now you can use your joystick thumb control to slew the targeting cursor
vtolvrStrings.content: Now you can use your joystick thumb control to slew the targeting cursor

vtolvrStrings.description: Slew the cursor onto the enemy radar, then press in on the thumb control to set the target
vtolvrStrings.content: Slew the cursor onto the enemy radar, then press in on the thumb control to set the target

vtolvrStrings.description: A square will appear on the selected target in both the MFD and the HUD
vtolvrStrings.content: A square will appear on the selected target in both the MFD and the HUD

vtolvrStrings.description: This is a high speed, fire-and-forget anti-radiation missile (ARM)
vtolvrStrings.content: This is a high speed, fire-and-forget anti-radiation missile (ARM)

vtolvrStrings.description: When fired, it will home in on the radar source designated in the ARAD
vtolvrStrings.content: When fired, it will home in on the radar source designated in the ARAD

vtolvrStrings.description: Once you have a target selected, all you need to do is fly toward the target, and fire once the missile is in range
vtolvrStrings.content: Once you have a target selected, all you need to do is fly toward the target, and fire once the missile is in range

vtolvrStrings.description: Try taking out the SAM radars using the AGM-88
vtolvrStrings.content: Try taking out the SAM radars using the AGM-88

vtolvrStrings.description: Great!  This is the end of the SEAD tutorial.
vtolvrStrings.content: Great!  This is the end of the SEAD tutorial.

vtolvrStrings.description: Welcome to the AH-94 Attack Helicopter
vtolvrStrings.content: Welcome to the AH-94 Attack Helicopter

vtolvrStrings.description:
Don't worry about memorizing everything now.
We'll go into more details in later sessions.
vtolvrStrings.content:
Don't worry about memorizing everything now.
We'll go into more details in later sessions.

vtolvrStrings.description: The AH-94 is a twin turboshaft attack helicopter with a tandem cockpit for two crew members.
vtolvrStrings.content: The AH-94 is a twin turboshaft attack helicopter with a tandem cockpit for two crew members.

vtolvrStrings.description: It has a traditional rotor configuration of a large main rotor and small tail rotor.
vtolvrStrings.content: It has a traditional rotor configuration of a large main rotor and small tail rotor.

vtolvrStrings.description: The helicopter can be flown from either the rear pilot seat, or the front copilot gunner seat.
vtolvrStrings.content: The helicopter can be flown from either the rear pilot seat, or the front copilot gunner seat.

vtolvrStrings.description: You can decide how to split up responsibilities.
vtolvrStrings.content: You can decide how to split up responsibilities.

vtolvrStrings.description: Now, let's quickly go over each of the components in the cockpit.
vtolvrStrings.content: Now, let's quickly go over each of the components in the cockpit.

vtolvrStrings.description:
Finally, and most importantly,
the flight controls...
vtolvrStrings.content:
Finally, and most importantly,
the flight controls...

vtolvrStrings.description: Used to control weapons and sensors
vtolvrStrings.content: Used to control weapons and sensors

vtolvrStrings.description:
This concludes the general overview of the AH-94 cockpit. 
You can move on to the next session to learn about how to get this thing started
vtolvrStrings.content:
This concludes the general overview of the AH-94 cockpit. 
You can move on to the next session to learn about how to get this thing started

vtolvrStrings.description:
Welcome back. 
In this session, we'll go over the start up and shut down procedures.
vtolvrStrings.content:
Welcome back. 
In this session, we'll go over the start up and shut down procedures.

vtolvrStrings.description: Before starting up, let's make sure everythings in the right state.
vtolvrStrings.content: Before starting up, let's make sure everythings in the right state.

vtolvrStrings.description: This will supply power to all of the aircraft's electrical components.
vtolvrStrings.content: This will supply power to all of the aircraft's electrical components.

vtolvrStrings.description: The engine starters use up a lot of power so we're gonna need the APU to keep the battery charged.
vtolvrStrings.content: The engine starters use up a lot of power so we're gonna need the APU to keep the battery charged.

vtolvrStrings.description: This system will spin up the turbine to a suitable RPM to begin combustion.
vtolvrStrings.content: This system will spin up the turbine to a suitable RPM to begin combustion.

vtolvrStrings.description: Running two starters can often overload the power supply so I'd start one at a time.
vtolvrStrings.content: Running two starters can often overload the power supply so I'd start one at a time.

vtolvrStrings.description: The starter  will run the turbine up to about 30% and automatically shut itself off.
vtolvrStrings.content: The starter  will run the turbine up to about 30% and automatically shut itself off.

vtolvrStrings.description: Great, now both engines are fired up and running stable at idle.
vtolvrStrings.content: Great, now both engines are fired up and running stable at idle.

vtolvrStrings.description:
You don't need to worry about
 applying the the proper throttle to maintain rotor RPM.
vtolvrStrings.content:
You don't need to worry about
 applying the the proper throttle to maintain rotor RPM.

vtolvrStrings.description: Just leave the power lever in the flight position and the system handles it for you.
vtolvrStrings.content: Just leave the power lever in the flight position and the system handles it for you.

vtolvrStrings.description: At this point, the helicopter is ready to take off!
vtolvrStrings.content: At this point, the helicopter is ready to take off!

vtolvrStrings.description: We can practice taking off and hovering in another session, so let's go over the shut down procedure.
vtolvrStrings.content: We can practice taking off and hovering in another session, so let's go over the shut down procedure.

vtolvrStrings.description: And that's it!  This concludes the AH-94 start up and shutdown procedures.  See you next time.
vtolvrStrings.content: And that's it!  This concludes the AH-94 start up and shutdown procedures.  See you next time.

vtolvrStrings.description: Welcome!  Today we'll learn about the TADS and how to use the gun along side it.
vtolvrStrings.content: Welcome!  Today we'll learn about the TADS and how to use the gun along side it.

vtolvrStrings.description: To make things easy, we can do this all here on the ground so you don't have to worry about flying.
vtolvrStrings.content: To make things easy, we can do this all here on the ground so you don't have to worry about flying.

vtolvrStrings.description: For this tutorial, let's turn on some hints so you can see what the controls do.
vtolvrStrings.content: For this tutorial, let's turn on some hints so you can see what the controls do.

vtolvrStrings.description: This will show labels when you grab the collective, cyclic, or TEDAC, and can be on or off at any time.
vtolvrStrings.content: This will show labels when you grab the collective, cyclic, or TEDAC, and can be on or off at any time.

vtolvrStrings.description: The primary targeting system is the TADS and you'll most often be using it on the TEDAC, which stands for TADS electronic display and contro
vtolvrStrings.content: The primary targeting system is the TADS and you'll most often be using it on the TEDAC, which stands for TADS electronic display and contro

vtolvrStrings.description: This works just like the TGP in the other vehicles except that the SOI controls are on the left hand.
vtolvrStrings.content: This works just like the TGP in the other vehicles except that the SOI controls are on the left hand.

vtolvrStrings.description: While the TEDAC controls are held, use the left thumb control to slew the sensor, and the right thumb control to zoom in and out.
vtolvrStrings.content: While the TEDAC controls are held, use the left thumb control to slew the sensor, and the right thumb control to zoom in and out.

vtolvrStrings.description: Switch weapons by using the thumb button on the right hand TEDAC control, and fire by using the right trigger.
vtolvrStrings.content: Switch weapons by using the thumb button on the right hand TEDAC control, and fire by using the right trigger.

vtolvrStrings.description: Fire and switch weapons on cyclic.
vtolvrStrings.content: Fire and switch weapons on cyclic.

vtolvrStrings.description: Let's make sure that the gun is in slave mode, so the turret will point where we want it.
vtolvrStrings.content: Let's make sure that the gun is in slave mode, so the turret will point where we want it.

vtolvrStrings.description: When the gun is slaved, it will either track to where your head is pointing, or to where the TADS is pointing, when the TADS is the SOI.
vtolvrStrings.content: When the gun is slaved, it will either track to where your head is pointing, or to where the TADS is pointing, when the TADS is the SOI.

vtolvrStrings.description: Use the TADS to find and designate the target on the range, and use the right trigger to fire.
vtolvrStrings.content: Use the TADS to find and designate the target on the range, and use the right trigger to fire.

vtolvrStrings.description: Shoot the target to your left.
vtolvrStrings.content: Shoot the target to your left.

vtolvrStrings.description: You can also set the TADS as SOI and enabled HEAD mode to have the TADS track your head, and display it's view in your HMD.
vtolvrStrings.content: You can also set the TADS as SOI and enabled HEAD mode to have the TADS track your head, and display it's view in your HMD.

vtolvrStrings.description: When in this mode, pressing in on the left thumbstick on the TEDAC will lock the TADS to where you've pointed it.
vtolvrStrings.content: When in this mode, pressing in on the left thumbstick on the TEDAC will lock the TADS to where you've pointed it.

vtolvrStrings.description: As you can see, the TADS and the Weapons can be controlled independently or in unison.
vtolvrStrings.content: As you can see, the TADS and the Weapons can be controlled independently or in unison.

vtolvrStrings.description: If you have a copilot, you or your copilot can take control of either system by using the SOI button and the master ARM button respectively.
vtolvrStrings.content: If you have a copilot, you or your copilot can take control of either system by using the SOI button and the master ARM button respectively.

vtolvrStrings.description:
You have control = RED
Copilot has control = YELLOW
vtolvrStrings.content:
You have control = RED
Copilot has control = YELLOW

vtolvrStrings.description: Same functions as TEDAC R except trim
vtolvrStrings.content: Same functions as TEDAC R except trim

That's all for today!
Go practice!
vtolvrStrings.content:
